title: White Wine Glass, "Palais", 1865
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of Dale and Doug Anderson, Anonymous Donor, Arthur Liu, and Prairie Pictures, Inc. and from General Acquisitions Endowment Fund
description:
Mouth-blown crystal, elaborately facet-cut and polished, with precisely planned bubble in the stem.
One of the very typical patterns of the "Historismus" ("Victorian" or "Viennese Ring Road") style.

participants.person_name: J. & L. Lobmeyr GmbH, Vienna, Austria

exhibitions.title: Ted Muehling Selects: Lobmeyr Glass from the Permanent Collection

tombstone.epitaph:
White Wine Glass, "Palais", 1865.
1865. Glass. Museum purchase through gift of Dale and Doug Anderson, Anonymous Donor, Arthur Liu, and Prairie Pictures, Inc. and from General Acquisitions Endowment Fund. 2009-18-27.
